author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-91. cpp: Fix compilation on Fedora Core 9
It turns out that __STDC_LIMIT_MACROS is not portable.
Include limits.h at least until cstdint becomes mainstream.

author: mriou
msg: On event didn't properly notify its parent scope when it exited, resulting in a dangling scope.
This is an empty revision for padding.
